name: Drone Racing Simulator - Quadcopter Flight Challenge
name_original: Drone Racing Simulator - Quadcopter Flight Challenge
description:
Drone Racing Simulator - A fun way to test your drone racing skills on your device. Hold on while you fly and speed through the sky. Stay on long enough and you will be taken on epic obstacle courses. There are many different obstacles, so watch out for them and see how far you can fly.

Goal is simple: Hold down on the device and control the drone through the obstacle course. Avoid crashing into the obstacles.

Collect coins to unlock awesome new drones. Better yet, have fun playing! Get those fingers ready!

[Features]
• 10 New Drones to Unlock
• Epic Obstacle Courses
• Collect Coins for New Drones
• Beat your Friends and Family's High Score
• More coming soon...

For more latest news and updates on Drone Racing Simulator, follow us here:
